verses.verse: Come, <WH1980> and let us return <WH7725> unto <WH413> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> he <WH1931> hath torn, <WH2963> and he will heal <WH7495> us; he hath smitten, <WH5221> and he will bind us up. <WH2280>
After two days <WH4480> <WH3117> will he revive <WH2421> us: in the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> he will raise us up, <WH6965> and we shall live <WH2421> in his sight. <WH6440>

Then shall we know, <WH3045> if we follow on <WH7291> to know <WH3045> <WH853> the LORD: <WH3068> his going forth <WH4161> is prepared <WH3559> as the morning; <WH7837> and he shall come <WH935> unto us as the rain, <WH1653> as the latter <WH4456> and former rain <WH3138> unto the earth. <WH776>

O Ephraim, <WH669> what <WH4100> shall I do <WH6213> unto thee? O Judah, <WH3063> what <WH4100> shall I do <WH6213> unto thee? for your goodness <WH2617> is as a morning <WH1242> cloud, <WH6051> and as the early <WH7925> dew <WH2919> it goeth away. <WH1980>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> have I hewed <WH2672> them by the prophets; <WH5030> I have slain <WH2026> them by the words <WH561> of my mouth: <WH6310> and thy judgments <WH4941> are as the light <WH216> that goeth forth. <WH3318>
For <WH3588> I desired <WH2654> mercy, <WH2617> and not <WH3808> sacrifice; <WH2077> and the knowledge <WH1847> of God <WH430> more than burnt offerings. <WH4480> <WH5930>
But they <WH1992> like men <WH120> have transgressed <WH5674> the covenant: <WH1285> there <WH8033> have they dealt treacherously <WH898> against me.
Gilead <WH1568> is a city <WH7151> of them that work <WH6466> iniquity, <WH205> and is polluted <WH6121> with blood. <WH4480> <WH1818>

And as troops of robbers <WH1416> wait <WH2442> for a man, <WH376> so the company <WH2267> of priests <WH3548> murder <WH7523> in the way <WH1870> by consent: <WH7926> for <WH3588> they commit <WH6213> lewdness. <WH2154>
I have seen <WH7200> a horrible thing <WH8186> in the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> there <WH8033> is the whoredom <WH2184> of Ephraim, <WH669> Israel <WH3478> is defiled. <WH2930>
Also, <WH1571> O Judah, <WH3063> he hath set <WH7896> a harvest <WH7105> for thee, when I returned <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of my people. <WH5971>
